title: Vegan Green Chile Cilantro Sauce
directions: Combine cashews, green chile peppers, hemp milk, jalapeno pepper, and salt in a blender; process until smooth.
Pour blended mixture into a small bowl; stir in cilantro.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chile peppers
1/2 jalapeno pepper with seeds, or more to taste
